message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.

I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done some research and I believe it's a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you've done your research, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that $9,000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but $9,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000, as I mentioned before. However, I'm willing to throw in an additional $500 for a total of $9,500 if you can throw in some extras or services that come with the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're looking for some extras, Bob. I'm willing to throw in a premium support package that includes dedicated customer service and priority updates for the next 6 months. This package is normally valued at $1,000, but I'm willing to include it in the deal for free if you're willing to meet me at $9,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate the offer of the premium support package, but I'm still not willing to meet you at $9,500. I'm willing to pay $8,800 for the product, and I'll accept the premium support package as a value-add. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $8,800, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9,200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value of the product and the premium support package. I hope you'll consider this offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $9,200. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product, and I'll accept the premium support package. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
